block.p: HOLIDAY RV SUPERSTORES, -- Fort Lauderdale, Fla., the only publicly traded chain of recreational vehicle and boat dealerships in the United States, agreed to buy four dealerships from Emerald Coast RV Center, to expand in the Southeast. The purchase price was not disclosed.

CONTINENTAL AIRLINES, -- Houston, the No. 5 airline in the United States, said it ordered 15 757-300 aircraft from the Boeing Co., Seattle, in a deal listed at $1.2 billion.

QUANTA SERVICES, -- Houston, an installer of power and phone lines, said it bought four companies in Michigan, Texas, Montana and New York with about $110 million in expected annual sales. Terms were not disclosed.
REDOX BRANDS, -- West Chester, Ohio, a company formed to buy cleaning brands, said it had purchased the Biz laundry bleach business from Procter & Gamble, Cincinnati. Terms were not disclosed.
